definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_set_scoreboard_score"><value name="score"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tpa</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_from_text"><value name="NUMTEXT"><block type="get_command_parameters"><field name="paramid">0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_run_function"><value name="function"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">engiesvanillaextras:send_tpa</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a[tag=tpa.sender] ["",{"text":"You have requested to teleport to ","color":"gold"},{"selector":"@a[tag=tpa.target,limit=1]","color":"yellow"},{"text":". To cancel the request, type /tpcancel or click the underlined here: ","color":"gold"},{"text":"/tpcancel","color":"gold","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/tpcancel"}}]</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @a[tag=tpa.target] ["",{"selector":"@a[tag=tpa.sender]","color":"yellow"},{"text":" has sent you a teleport request, to accept type /tpaccept \u0020or click the underlined here: ","color":"gold"},{"text":"/tpaccept 1","underlined":true,"color":"gold","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"/tpaccept 1"}}]</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
